title: Fateh box office collection Day 1: Sonu Sood starrer off to a slow start with Rs 2.45 crore debut - TOI Etimes
summary:
Fateh Box Office Collection Day 1: Sonu Sood Starrer Off to a Slow Start with Rs 2.45 Crore Debut

Publication Date: [Date not provided] Source: Times of India

The much-anticipated action film Fateh, featuring Sonu Sood, opened to a subdued box office collection of Rs 2.45 crore on its first day.

  • The film revolves around themes of cybercrime, justice, and resilience.
  • Initial predictions estimated the film's first-day collection to be between Rs 70 lakh and Rs 1 crore.
  • Sood's return as a lead actor was highly anticipated, especially after his philanthropic work during the pandemic.
  • Fateh faces tough competition from major releases such as Ram Charan's Game Changer and Allu Arjun's Pushpa 2.
  • Industry experts suggest that positive word-of-mouth may improve the film's performance over the weekend.
  • Salman Khan showed support for Fateh, connecting it with a song he previously contributed to.
“I also have a contribution in the film Fateh. The song 'Heer' was very dear to me, but now it is part of this film.” - Salman Khan

As the weekend progresses, the success of 'Fateh' is dependent on audience response and critical reception.
newTitle: Fateh Box Office Collection: A Slow Start for Sonu Sood's Film

Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah's Gurucharan Singh 'Critical': 'Has Not Eaten Food For 19 Days' - News18
summary:
Gurucharan Singh from Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah in Critical Condition After 19 Days Without Food

Date: January 10, 2025 Source: News18

Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah actor Gurucharan Singh is currently hospitalized and in critical condition after not eating for 19 days.

  • His friend Bhakti Soni expressed concern over Singh's health, stating he has not taken any food or water.
  • During their last conversation, Singh indicated uncertainty about his survival.
  • He recently shared a video on Instagram, thanking everyone for their support and acknowledging his serious health condition.
  • Gurucharan Singh is well-known for his role as Roshan Singh Sodhi on the show.
“He hasn’t eaten food or drunk water for 19 days. Because of that, he fell unconscious and was quickly rushed to the hospital.” - Bhakti Soni

In conclusion, Singh’s situation is dire, and he is under medical care while his friends and family express their utmost concern over his well-being.
newTitle: Gurucharan Singh from Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah in Critical Condition After 19 Days Without Food

Game Changer box office collection day 1: Ram Charan, Shankar's film takes fantastic start, earns Rs 32 crores - DNA India
summary:
Game Changer Takes Fantastic Start at Box Office, Earns Rs 32 Crores on Day 1

Publication Date: January 10, 2025
Source: DNA India

Ram Charan and Shankar's film 'Game Changer' has made a remarkable debut at the box office, earning Rs 32.41 crores across three languages.

  • The film is the first pan-Indian release of 2025 and has received positive reviews.
  • It outperformed Shankar's previous film, 'Indian 2', which earned Rs 25.60 crores.
  • The advance booking for 'Game Changer' was reported at Rs 26.80 crores.
  • The film is expected to end its first Friday collection in the range of Rs 35-37 crores.
“Everyone's favorite, #NaanaaHyraanaa has been edited out due to technical challenges encountered during the processing of infrared images.”

'Game Changer' promises to keep audiences engaged as it capitalizes on the momentum of its strong opening.
newTitle: Game Changer Takes Fantastic Start at Box Office, Earns Rs 32 Crores on Day 1

Game Changer movie leaked online: Ram Charan, Kiara Advani-starrer becomes the victim of piracy within hours of release - The Indian Express
summary:
Game Changer movie leaked online: Ram Charan, Kiara Advani-starrer becomes the victim of piracy within hours of release

Date: January 10, 2025 | Source: Indian Express

The much-anticipated film Game Changer, featuring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, was leaked online shortly after its release, raising concerns about piracy.

  • The film was released on January 10, 2025, but unauthorized copies began circulating within hours.
  • Pirated versions are reportedly available on several piracy websites, including Tamilrockers and Movierulz.
  • Fans reacted positively to the film, praising performances and specific scenes despite mixed reviews.
  • Three songs were reportedly edited out due to technical difficulties, with plans to add them back shortly.
  • The film has a reported budget of Rs 450 crore, making it one of the most expensive Tollywood films.
“#GameChanger is a crisp, fast-paced, & heartfelt entertainer. It boldly delves into themes of power dynamics & their ties to systemic injustices.”

This incident underscores the ongoing issue of film piracy, impacting the film industry significantly.
newTitle: Game Changer Movie Leaked Online: A Major Piracy Incident

title: Game Changer box office collection day 1 early report: Ram Charan-starrer likely to cross Rs 30 crore mark - The Indian Express
summary:
Game Changer Box Office Collection Day 1 Early Report

Date: January 10, 2025 Source: Indian Express

Introduction: After five years of anticipation, Game Changer, starring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, premiered on January 10 and garnered over Rs 32.41 crore by 9 PM on its opening day, signaling a strong box office performance.

  • The film has approximately 7500 shows across India, with the Telugu version leading with 3863 shows.
  • It earned Rs 43.55 crore in advance bookings, with Andhra Pradesh contributing the highest gross.
  • The release impacted the sales of Pushpa 2 tickets, which saw a significant decline.
  • Mixed reviews have been noted, with an average rating of 2.5 from SCREEN.
“Game Changer is essentially a lot of nice segments that are stitched together in the hope that it would make a good film.” - Avinash Ramachandran, SCREEN

Conclusion: Game Changer's debut reflects both the potential of Ram Charan’s star power and the challenges of mixed reviews, positioning it as a key player in the competitive box office landscape.
newTitle: Game Changer Box Office Collection Day 1: Ram Charan's Film Sees Promising Start

title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah's Gurucharan Singh is not eating any food, he is very unwell, says friend Bhakti Soni - Hindustan Times
summary:
Gurucharan Singh of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah Hospitalized and Struggling with Health

Date: Jan 10, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Gurucharan Singh, known for his role in Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah, is currently hospitalized in Mumbai. His friend Bhakti Soni has shared updates about his deteriorating health, stating he has stopped eating and is very weak.

  • Bhakti Soni revealed that Gurucharan has been unable to eat solid food for three months and has only consumed a liquid diet.
  • He fell unconscious recently due to not drinking water as well.
  • Gurucharan's family is reportedly facing financial difficulties, which may have contributed to his condition.
  • His friend Bhakti mentioned that attempts to communicate with Gurucharan have been unsuccessful as his family’s phones are switched off.
“I haven’t spoken to Gurucharan. I don’t know what’s happening with him, but from what I heard last, he is very weak.” - Bhakti Soni

Gurucharan shared a video from his hospital bed on Instagram, stating his condition has worsened and he will update fans about his health soon.
newTitle: Gurucharan Singh of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah Hospitalized and Struggling with Health

summary:

Date: Jan 10, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

The trailer for the upcoming romantic comedy Loveyapa has just been released, highlighting the challenges faced by Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor when their phones are swapped.

  • The trailer showcases the chemistry between Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor.
  • The narrative revolves around a challenge issued by Khushi's father to prove their love by exchanging phones.
  • The phone-swap leads to unexpected revelations and emotional chaos.
  • The film explores themes of trust and communication in modern relationships.
  • Loveyapa, directed by Advait Chandan, is set to release in theaters on February 7, 2025.
“The trailer shows that Loveyapa delves into the offbeat aspects of romance and warns viewers about the perils of phone-swapping.”

Loveyapa is anticipated to be a fresh take on romantic comedies, promising humor and drama.

title: Fateh Box Office Collection Day 1 Early Updates: Sonu Sood's Film Surpasses Expectations; Makes XX Crores - Filmibeat
summary:
Fateh Box Office Collection Day 1 Early Updates: Sonu Sood's Film Surpasses Expectations; Makes XX Crores

Publication Date: Friday, January 10, 2025 | Source: Filmibeat

Fateh, directed by Sonu Sood, received a positive response on its opening day, outperforming expectations with strong box office earnings.

  • The film grossed approximately Rs. 1.64 Crore by 8.30 PM on its first day.
  • Fateh's ticket prices were set at Rs. 99 for the opening day.
  • The movie beat its competitor Game Changer in occupancy rates, achieving 28.53% in the evening show.
  • Fateh is Sonu Sood's directorial debut, produced under Shakti Sagar Productions and Zee Studios.
“Fateh is surpassing our speculated amount of Rs. 1.5 Crore.”

The successful launch of Fateh signals a promising start for the film in the competitive box office landscape.
newTitle: Fateh Box Office Collection Surpasses Expectations on Day 1

title: Bigg Boss 18: Chahat Pandey's rumoured BF Manas Shah to appear, But there is a twist - India Forums
summary:
Bigg Boss 18: Chahat Pandey's rumoured BF Manas Shah to appear, But there is a twist

Published: Friday, January 10, 2025 at 2:07 PM

As Bigg Boss approaches its grand finale, the show is filled with drama and unexpected twists. Recent reports hint that Manas Shah will make an appearance, which adds another layer to the speculation surrounding Chahat Pandey's personal life.

  • Chahat Pandey's relationship rumors intensify, despite her denying claims of being in a relationship with a Gujarati man.
  • The controversy escalates after a photo of Chahat and Manas surfaced online, sparking speculation that he may be her secret boyfriend.
  • Manas is set to appear on the show, yet his entry was part of a humorous prank orchestrated by host Salman Khan.
  • Salman teased Chahat about the rumors, leading to a light-hearted moment that provided comic relief for the housemates.

title: Horoscope Today LIVE Updates on January 10, 2025 : Makar Sankranti 2025: What it means for your zodiac sign - Hindustan Times
Game Changer box office collection day 1: Ram Charan's film beats VVR opening, collects over ₹47 crore - Hindustan Times
summary:
Game Changer box office collection day 1: Shankar's Ram Charan, Kiara Advani-starrer film delves into corruption in electoral politics.

Date: Jan 11, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Ram Charan's latest film, Game Changer, released on January 10, 2025, and has made a significant impact at the box office, collecting over ₹47 crore on its opening day.

  • The film surpassed the first-day collection of Ram Charan's previous release, Vinaya Vidheya Rama (VVR).
  • Game Changer has achieved a box office collection of ₹47.13 crore net in India.
  • The collection breakdown includes ₹38 crore from Telugu, ₹2 crore from Tamil, ₹7 crore from Hindi, and small amounts from other languages.
  • The film had an impressive occupancy rate of over 55% for morning shows.
  • This marks Ram Charan's first solo film in six years.
“Game Changer is strictly average, even as you’re rooting for it to be something more. It succeeds in staying focused on what it sets out to do - call out corruption in Indian politics.”

In conclusion, Game Changer's strong opening day collection positions it as a notable release in the current cinematic landscape, indicating a positive reception and interest among audiences.
newTitle: Game Changer Box Office Collection Day 1: Ram Charan's Film Surpasses Previous Openings

title: SS Rajamouli unveils Dolby facility at Nagarjuna's Annapurna Studios: 'For RRR, we had to go to Germany for this' - Hindustan Times
summary:
Filmmaker SS Rajamouli Unveils Dolby-Certified Post-Production Facility

Date: Jan 10, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Filmmaker SS Rajamouli has launched a state-of-the-art Dolby-certified post-production facility at Nagarjuna's Annapurna Studios in Hyderabad, aiming to elevate audio-visual standards in Indian cinema.

  • The facility launched in collaboration with Dolby aims to enhance cinematic experiences in India.
  • Rajamouli expressed his previous challenges in grading films in Dolby Vision abroad, highlighting the facility's significance.
  • A special footage of Rajamouli's Academy-award-winning film, RRR, was showcased during the launch.
  • Nagarjuna Akkineni emphasized the studio's commitment to innovation and its legacy in Indian cinema.
“During the time of RRR, when we wanted to grade the film in Dolby Vision, we had to travel all the way to Germany... But today, I'm thrilled to see a Dolby Vision grading facility right here at Annapurna Studios.” - SS Rajamouli

This new facility marks a significant advancement for Indian filmmaking, promising enhanced cinematic standards and experiences for audiences.
newTitle: SS Rajamouli Launches Dolby Facility at Annapurna Studios

title: Loveyapa trailer out: Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor starrer unfolds Gen-Z romance with humor, drama, and secrets; watch - Bollywood Hungama

The trailer for the romantic comedy Loveyapa featuring Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor has been unveiled, showcasing a modern love story with elements of humor and drama aimed at Gen-Z audiences.

  • The trailer was launched at New Excelsior Mukta A2 Cinemas in Mumbai, the same venue where Aamir Khan's debut film was released.
  • Loveyapa explores themes of love with lively music and stunning visuals, targeting audiences of all ages.
  • Directed by Advait Chandan, the film is set to release on February 7, 2025, coinciding with Valentine's Day.
“This marked a special moment for Junaid Khan, as his debut theatrical film begins its journey at the same venue where his father's iconic debut film was released.”

The trailer of Loveyapa is expected to resonate well with young audiences, embodying the spirit of modern romance.
newTitle: Loveyapa Trailer Unveiled: A Gen-Z Romantic Comedy Featuring Junaid Khan and Khushi Kapoor

title: When Salim Khan revealed why marital bliss has always evaded Salman Khan - Hindustan Times
summary:
Salim Khan Explains Why Salman Khan Remains Single

Date: January 10, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

In a candid revelation, Salim Khan shared insights into why his son, Salman Khan, has never married, despite being one of Bollywood's most eligible bachelors. Salim pointed out a disconnect between Salman’s ideal of a partner and the type of women he tends to attract.

  • Salman Khan, turning 60 soon, remains one of Bollywood's most eligible bachelors.
  • Salim Khan stated that Salman’s attraction to glamorous actresses complicates his search for a partner resembling his mother.
  • According to Salim, the discrepancy in Salman's expectations and reality contributes to his single status.
  • Salman is set to appear in the upcoming film Sikandar, releasing this March.
“There is a contradiction in Salman’s thinking, which is one of the reasons why he’s not married…” - Salim Khan

This insight sheds light on Salman Khan's prolonged bachelorhood and the complexities surrounding his relationships.
newTitle: Salim Khan Explains Why Salman Khan Remains Single

title: Game Changer release highlights: Ram Charan, Kiara Advani film gets positive reviews; leaks on Day 1 - Hindustan Times
Fateh movie review: Sonu Sood goes into ‘Animal’ mode in this high-octane actioner - Hindustan Times
summary:
Fateh movie review: Sonu Sood tries his best to bring international action to desi screens.

Date: Jan 10, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Sonu Sood’s directorial debut offers a high-octane blend of action and a narrative focused on cyber crime. While it showcases impressive action sequences, the film struggles with its screenplay and depth of storytelling.

  • Sonu Sood plays Fateh Singh, a former secret agent turned contract killer.
  • The plot centers around fake loan apps and a missing girl entangled in a global scam.
  • The film features excessive violence that overshadows the intended theme of cyber crime.
  • Jacqueliene Fernandez portrays an ethical hacker but has a limited role.
  • The action sequences aim for international standards but lack substantive storytelling.
“The slick action stops evoking shock after a point, and the digital scam gets amateur treatment.”

In conclusion, while Fateh attempts to bring a captivating visual experience, it ultimately falls short in delivering a meaningful narrative.
newTitle: Fateh movie review: Sonu Sood tries his best to bring international action to desi screens.

title: Game Changer Box Office Day 1: Ram Charan Delivers 33% Higher Morning Hindi Occupancy Than Last Sankranti Hit HanuMan! - Koimoi

Ram Charan’s Game Changer has started on a very strong note at the box office, securing an occupancy of 47.58% in theaters from the morning and afternoon shows.

  • The film stars Kiara Advani along with Ram Charan.
  • Game Changer aims to break previous Sankranti records.
  • The Hindi version recorded a 33% increase in occupancy compared to last year's Sankranti hit HanuMan.
“An honest IAS officer’s fight against a corrupt political system through fair and transparent elections.”

Overall, Game Changer shows promise at the box office and could become Ram Charan’s biggest Sankranti opening.
newTitle: Game Changer Box Office Day 1: Ram Charan Delivers 33% Higher Morning Hindi Occupancy

title: Fateh Review: Sonu Sood's Bloody Attempt At Direction Is Explosive And Impressive - News18
summary:
Fateh Review: Sonu Sood's Bloody Attempt At Direction Is Explosive And Impressive

Last Updated: January 10, 2025, 21:35 IST | Source: News18

Fateh follows the story of a former agent turned dairy farm supervisor, who works to rescue a girl caught in an online loan scam, unearthing a cybercrime ring in the process.

  • The film marks Sonu Sood's directorial debut.
  • It features prominent actors such as Jacqueline Fernandez and Naseeruddin Shah.
  • The action sequences are intense, highlighting Sood's performance skills.
  • Critics noted a lack of depth in character development and writing.
  • While the film is visually appealing, it suffers from narrative inconsistencies.
Despite its flaws, the film is a decent watch for action genre fans.

In conclusion, while Fateh has its explosive moments, it also calls for better writing and emotional engagement from its cast.
newTitle: Fateh Review: Sonu Sood's Directorial Debut is Explosive Yet Flawed
